summary.span: 表示一个可以返回值的异步操作。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous operation that can return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示单个操作，该操作返回一个值并且通常以异步方式执行。The class represents a single operation that returns a value and that usually executes asynchronously. 对象是在 .NET Framework 4 中首次引入的[基于任务的异步模式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md)的中心组件之一。 objects are one of the central components of the [task-based asynchronous pattern](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/task-based-asynchronous-pattern-tap.md) first introduced in the .NET Framework 4. 由于对象执行的工作通常在线程池线程上异步执行，而不是在主应用程序线程上同步执行，因此你可以使用属性，以及、 和属性，用于确定任务的状态。Because the work performed by a object typically executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread rather than synchronously on the main application thread, you can use the property, as well as the , , and properties, to determine the state of a task. 通常，lambda 表达式用于指定任务要执行的工作。Most commonly, a lambda expression is used to specify the work that the task is to perform. 可以通过多种方式创建实例。 instances may be created in a variety of ways. 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，最常见的方法是调用静态或方法。The most common approach, which is available starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 这些方法提供了一种简单的方法来通过使用默认值来启动任务，而无需获取其他参数。These methods provide a simple way to start a task by using default values and without acquiring additional parameters. 下面的示例使用方法来启动任务，该任务将循环，并显示循环迭代次数：The following example uses the method to start a task that loops and then displays the number of loop iterations: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/run1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/run1.vb#6)] 另一种方法是在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]启动任务的最常见方法是调用静态或方法。An alternative, and the most common way to start a task in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], is to call the static or method. 属性返回一个对象， 属性返回一个对象。 The property returns a object, and the property returns a object. 使用其`StartNew`方法的重载可传递参数、定义任务创建选项，并指定任务计划程序。Overloads of their `StartNew` method let you pass arguments, define task creation options, and specify a task scheduler. 下面的示例使用方法来启动任务。The following example uses the method to start a task. 它在功能上等效于上一示例中的代码。It is functionally equivalent to the code in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/cs/startnew1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1/vb/startnew1.vb#7)] 有关更完整的示例，请参阅[基于任务的异步编程](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md)。For more complete examples, see [Task-based Asynchronous Programming](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-based-asynchronous-programming.md). 类还提供了初始化任务的构造函数，但未计划执行该任务。The class also provides constructors that initialize the task but that do not schedule it for execution. 出于性能原因， 和`Task.Factory.StartNew`方法是用于创建和计划计算任务的首选机制，但对于必须分隔任务创建和计划的情况，可以使用构造函数，然后， 可以使用任务的方法来计划稍后执行该任务。For performance reasons, the and `Task.Factory.StartNew` methods are the preferred mechanisms for creating and scheduling computational tasks, but for scenarios where task creation and scheduling must be separated, the constructors may be used, and the task's method may then be used to schedule the task for execution at a later time. 从面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]桌面应用程序开始，创建和调用任务的线程的区域性将成为线程上下文的一部分。Starting with desktop apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the thread that creates and invokes a task becomes part of the thread's context. 也就是说，无论执行任务的线程的当前区域性如何，任务的当前区域性都是调用线程的区域性。That is, regardless of the current culture of the thread on which the task executes, the current culture of the task is the culture of the calling thread. 对于面向之前[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]的 .NET Framework 版本的应用，任务的区域性是执行任务的线程的区域性。For apps that target versions of the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the culture of the task is the culture of the thread on which the task executes. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题中的 "区域性和基于任务的异步操作" 一节。For more information, see the "Culture and task-based asynchronous operations" section in the topic. 请注意，应用商店应用按照设置和获取默认区域性中的 Windows 运行时。Note that Store apps follow the Windows Runtime in setting and getting the default culture. 对于不返回值的操作，请使用类。For operations that do not return a value, you use the class. 从C# 7.0 开始，对于作为值类型而不是引用类型的轻量级任务，请使用结构。Starting with C# 7.0, for a more lightweight task that is a value type rather than a reference type, use the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只应在需要分离任务的创建和启动的高级方案中使用。This constructor should only be used in advanced scenarios where it is required that the creation and starting of the task is separated. 不是调用此构造函数，实例化对象和启动任务的最常见方法是调用静态和方法。Rather than calling this constructor, the most common way to instantiate a object and launch a task is by calling the static and methods. 如果只是为了让 API 的使用者有权等待某些内容而不需要执行任何操作的任务 ，则应使用。If a task with no action is needed just for the consumer of an API to have something to await, a should be used. ## Examples 下面的示例对表示已发布书籍的文本文件中的单词的近似数目进行计数。The following example counts the approximate number of words in text files that represent published books. 每个任务都负责打开文件，异步读取其全部内容，并使用正则表达式计算单词计数。Each task is responsible for opening a file, reading its entire contents asynchronously, and calculating the word count by using a regular expression. 调用方法以确保所有任务都已完成，然后在控制台中显示每本书的字数。The method is called to ensure that all tasks have completed before displaying the word count of each book to the console. 在此示例中，对象实例化与对象执行分离，因此，该示例可以确保每个文件存在。Object instantiation is separated from object execution in this example so that the example can ensure that each file exists. 否则，将显示缺少的文件的名称。If they do not, it displays the name of the missing file. 否则，它会调用方法来启动每个任务。Otherwise, it calls the method to launch each task. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/cs/run3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task.ctor/vb/run3.vb#2)] 正则表达式模式`\p{P}*\s+`匹配后跟一个或多个空白字符的零个、一个或多个标点符号字符。The regular expression pattern `\p{P}*\s+` matches zero, one, or more punctuation characters followed by one or more white-space characters. 它假定匹配项总数等于大致单词计数。It assumes that the total number of matches equals the approximate word count.

span.span: Creates a continuation that executes asynchronously when the target task completes.
A new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的将不会计划执行，直到当前任务已完成，该任务是否已完成，因为该任务已成功完成、是否由于未经处理的异常而出错，或由于被取消而导致退出。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个前面的任务，该任务使用尼斯筛法的埃拉托色计算1与用户输入的值之间的质数。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 数组用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示数字，该元素的值指示该数字是复合的（其值为`true`）还是质数（其值为`false`）。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 然后，将此任务传递到延续任务，该任务负责从整数数组中提取质数并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的将不会计划执行，直到当前任务已完成，该任务是否已完成，因为该任务已成功完成、是否由于未经处理的异常而发生故障，或由于被取消而发生错误。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个任务，该任务被传递一个介于2和20之间的整数，并返回一个数组，该数组包含该数字的前10个指数（从 n1到 n10）。The following example creates a task that is passed an integer between 2 and 20 and returns an array that contains the first ten exponents (from n1 to n10) of that number. 然后，延续任务负责显示指数。A continuation task is then responsible for displaying the exponents. 它同时传递前面的任务和前面的任务生成的初始数字。It is passed both the antecedent and the original number whose exponents the antecedent generates. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continuewith3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continuewith3.vb#3)]

A new continuation task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的将不会计划执行，直到当前任务已完成，该任务是否已完成，因为该任务已成功完成、是否由于未经处理的异常而发生故障，或由于被取消而发生错误。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个前面的任务，该任务使用尼斯筛法的埃拉托色计算1与用户输入的值之间的质数。The following example creates an antecedent task that uses the Sieve of Eratosthenes to calculate the prime numbers between 1 and a value entered by the user. 数组用于保存有关质数的信息。An array is used to hold information about the prime numbers. 数组索引表示数字，该元素的值指示该数字是复合的（其值为`true`）还是质数（其值为`false`）。The array index represents the number, and the element's value indicates whether that number is composite (its value is `true`) or prime (its value is `false`). 然后，将此任务传递到延续任务，该任务负责从整数数组中提取质数并显示它们。This task is then passed to a continuation task, which is responsible for extracting the prime numbers from the integer array and displaying them. 取消标记将同时传递到前面的任务和延续任务。A cancellation token is passed to both the antecedent and the continuation task. 对象用于定义的超时值为100毫秒。A object is used to define a timeout value of 100 milliseconds. 如果事件激发，将调用方法，并且取消标记用于请求取消任务。If the event fires, the method is called, and the cancellation token is used to request cancellation of the tasks. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/cs/continue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Task\`1.ContinueWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.task`1.continuewith/vb/continue1.vb#1)] 通常，提供约100000的值会导致超时间隔过期，并引发事件以及要设置的取消请求。Typically, supplying a value of about 100,000 causes the timeout interval to expire and the event to fire, and the cancellation request to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的将不会计划执行，直到当前任务已完成，该任务是否已完成，因为该任务已成功完成、是否由于未经处理的异常而发生故障，或由于被取消而发生错误。The returned will not be scheduled for execution until the current task has completed, whether it completes due to running to completion successfully, faulting due to an unhandled exception, or exiting out early due to being canceled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个延续任务链。The following example creates a chain of continuation tasks. 每个任务都为 方法的状态参数提供当前时间，即对象。Each task provides the current time, a object, for the state argument of the method. 每个值都表示创建继续任务的时间。Each value represents the time at which the continue task is created. 每个任务都将生成一个表示任务完成时间的第二个值。Each task produces as its result a second value that represents the time at which the task finishes. 所有任务完成后，该示例将显示每个延续任务的开始和结束日期和时间。After all tasks finish, the example displays the date and times at which each continuation task starts and finishes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回类的默认实例，该实例与通过调用无参数构造函数创建的实例相同。This property returns a default instance of the class that is identical to the one created by calling the parameterless constructor. 它具有以下属性值：It has the following property values: |PropertyProperty|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||| ||| ||| ||`null`，或`null`, or | 此属性的最常见用途是在一次调用方法时创建并启动一个新任务。The most common use of this property is to create and start a new task in a single call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] ，方法提供了使用默认配置值创建对象的最简单方法。 Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the method provides the easiest way to create a object with default configuration values. 下面的示例使用静态属性对方法进行三次调用。The following example uses the static property to make three calls to the method. 第一个启动一个`Task`对象，该对象执行返回1的 lambda 表达式。The first starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that returns 1. 第二个启动`Task`对象，该对象执行实例化新`Test`实例的 lambda 表达式。The second starts a `Task` object, which executes a lambda expression that instantiates a new `Test` instance. 第三个启动`Task`一个对象，该对象枚举 C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures \ 目录中的文件。The third starts a `Task` object, which enumerates the files in the C:\Users\Public\Pictures\Sample Pictures\ directory. （请注意，成功执行该示例需要目录存在，并且该目录包含文件。(Note that successful execution of the example requires that the directory exist and that it contain files. summary.span: 获取此 的结果值。

span.span: Gets the result value of this .

value.span: 此的结果值，其类型与任务的类型参数相同。

span.span: The result value of this , which is of the same type as the task's type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问属性的 get 访问器会阻止调用线程，直到异步操作完成;它等效于调用方法。Accessing the property's get accessor blocks the calling thread until the asynchronous operation is complete; it is equivalent to calling the method. 操作结果可用后，它将被存储并在对属性的后续调用后立即返回。Once the result of an operation is available, it is stored and is returned immediately on subsequent calls to the property. 请注意，如果在任务的操作过程中发生异常，或者如果任务已取消，则属性不会返回值。Note that, if an exception occurred during the operation of the task, or if the task has been cancelled, the property does not return a value. 相反，尝试访问属性值会引发异常。Instead, attempting to access the property value throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例是一个命令行实用工具，该实用工具计算每个目录中的文件中其名称作为命令行参数传递的字节数。The following example is a command-line utility that calculates the number of bytes in the files in each directory whose name is passed as a command-line argument. 如果目录包含文件，它将执行一个 lambda 表达式，该表达式为目录中的每个文件实例化对象，并检索其属性的值。If the directory contains files, it executes a lambda expression that instantiates a object for each file in the directory and retrieves the value of its property. 如果目录不包含任何文件，它只需调用方法来创建其属性为零（0）的任务。If a directory contains no files, it simply calls the method to create a task whose property is zero (0). 任务完成后，可从属性获取所有目录文件中的总字节数。When the tasks finish, the total number of bytes in all a directory's files is available from the property.
